Text: FW November March Bid PackageOriginal Message From Henk Robert Sent Tuesday October PM To Subject November March Bid Package Jane Bass Enterprises Production Co invites you to bid on the attached packages of natural gas We prefer bids based on firstofthemonth IFERC Pipeline Index are premiums out there for the period November through March Please note that West Sandy Hook must be purchased along with Pointe a la HacheCox Bay Please have your bids to me by the end of business on Tuesday October The attached spreadsheet should be self explanatory If you have any questions please call me at Thanks Rob Henk Bass Enterprises Production Co bidAxls bidAxls
